docs.lead_paragraph: The " Non-Representational " Manner. It is one of the misfortunes of those multitudinous souls who aspire to be artistically original that new catchwords are so much more abundant than new artistic conventions. " The Show Booth," by Alexander Blok and " King Solomon's Song of Songs" were produced at the Booth Theatre yesterday afternoon " in the non-representational manner," under the advice of a formidable and portentous board, ranging diagonally.
docs.abstract: The Show Booth and King Solomon's Song of Songs
